/usr/local/cuda-10.1/bin/nvcc   -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/tf_grouping.dir/tf_grouping.cu.o CMakeFiles/tf_grouping.dir/tf_grouping.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/tf_grouping.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -L/home/yxf281/.conda/envs/my_ml_py36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow_core  -L/usr/local/cuda-10.1/targets/ppc64le-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-10.1/targets/ppc64le-linux/lib  -L/usr/lib/gcc/ppc64le-redhat-linux/4.8.5 -lcudart -ltensorflow_framework -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
